Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1,000,000 to you. Considering the immense worth and benefits this product offers, I am extending a special offer to you. For a limited time, you have the chance to secure this remarkable item at a price of $950,000. This is a unique chance to own something truly extraordinary at a highly competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
